snippet: Coach Tom Coughlin and general manager Jerry Reese are getting one more chance to turn around the New York Giants — or else....

headline.print_headline: Tom Coughlin, Jerry Reese Returning to Giants
headline.main: Tom Coughlin, Jerry Reese Returning to Giants

lead_paragraph: Coach Tom Coughlin and general manager Jerry Reese are getting one more chance to turn around the New York Giants — or else.
